segments.text: Hello , Fred . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me the concept of e-commerce ? Now , many people mentioned the word , ' e-commerce ' , in front of me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: E-commerce , or Electronic Commerce is the practice of purchasing and selling products or services over the Internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of channels can you use in e-commerce ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can complete a trade by email , electronic data interchange and smart cards , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the benefits of e-commerce ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Firstly , it can overcome the geographic limitation . And secondly , e-commerce can lower the internal costs . And thirdly , people like us , can also open stores on Internet .
segments.speaker: S2
